I

IBiote - Interface in org.ensor.scheduler
 
IComponent - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
This interface models a component of a robotic system.
IComponentContainer - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
This interface models a container which can contain one or more component objects.
IConfigurable - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
This interface represents an object which can be configured.
ICurrentMeasurable - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
This interface models an object which has electrical characteristics of voltage drop and current draw.
IMotor - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
This interface represents a single motor object which is run at a particular voltage and can draw current.
IMotorWithEncoder - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
 
IServo - Interface in org.ensor.robots.motors
A servo object is an object which represents a physical servo device.

ITTY - Interface in org.ensor.robots.comm

S

saveNonVolatileConfiguration() - Method in interface org.ensor.robots.motors.IConfigurable
